articles.title: WhatsApp loses MILLIONS of users to rivals Telegram and Signal ahead of privacy policy update - Daily Mail
articles.description: New figures shared by the UK parliament's home affairs committee show that in the first three weeks of the year, Signal gained 7.5 million users, while Telegram gained a whopping 25 million.
articles.content:
Millions of WhatsApp users have taken the drastic step of abandoning the app, following a poorly explained update to the terms and conditions.
Rival apps have gained many of these disgruntled users,… [+10685 chars]
